description: Disorienting as this may seem, there is no unit of measurement for the recipe below If I added “teacup,” I worry that it would prevent you from using an au lait bowl, a Champagne coupe or a coffee urn, when in fact they will all serve very well (Figure that a pint glass will feed four.)
title: Unmeasured Crepes
text:
Disorienting as this may seem, there is no unit of measurement for the recipe below. If I added “teacup,” I worry that it would prevent you from using an au lait bowl, a Champagne coupe or a coffee urn, when in fact they will all serve very well. (Figure that a pint glass will feed four.)
Featured in: A Measured Approach To Cooking.
